text: Begumon, Alloh xoʙi pajomʙarasro ʙa rosti pajvast, ki gufta ʙud: "Agar Alloh ʙixohad, U va ashoʙas emin, guruhe sar tarosida va guruhe muj kutoh karda, ʙe hec ʙime az ahli sirk ʙa mascidulharom doxil mesavand". Pas Alloh cizhoe medonist, ki sumo namedonisted. Pas oson kard ʙa sumo pes az daromadani Makka jak fathi nazdikro (ja'ne, sulhi Hudajʙija jo fathi Xajʙarro)
